name: Murcinojo
description:
UPDATE: I added a simple dust mechanic to the floor.  When dusty tiles are touched they turn to lighter dust.  A moment later the dust "resettles."

A local coop game of blind tag set in an old house during an electrical storm.  Stalk the other player invisibly between the lightning strikes but beware, you aren't the only one stalking tonight.

Murcinojo is the the 4th in a series of learning projects created mostly live on twitch.tv/verbalprocessing.  It has a few bugs but is the most playable project we've created to date.

Thanks to The Greeni Porcini for the concept and artwork as well as Three Ribbon Studios for the sound and music!
